NOTE: To play this game it is necessary to install the Pc-version on your Computer. Your smartphone and the computer have to be in the same wifi-network. The IP of the Computer should be "192.168.1.106".
This game is about slacking as many flames as possible. For every fire you slack you gain points, but hint: if your waterjet hits a bird or a cat your points will decrease.
-Using the direction-buttons you can move your firefighter left or right
-Tilting your smartphone forward or backwards will change the length of your waterjet
-Tilting your smartphone to the left or to the right will change the direction of your waterjet
-As soon as your water tank is empty your smartphones switches to the pumping-minigame. In this game you have to alternately push the left- and right-buttons until your water tank is full again. Then your smartphones automatically switches back to the normal playingscreen.
-It is also possible to switch manually in the pumping-minigame and back. Therefore you can press the pumping-button on the bottom right of your playingscreen. To go back to the playingscreen you can push the same button or the back button of your smartphone.
Good luck and have fun!
Press pumps alternately to refill water!
